text: Everyone who likes horror films should see Scary Movie. Shorty was funny. As for the other ones... go ahead and indulge if you like, but you'd mostly be wasting your time. I'm glad this genre exists though. Just one more spoof genre people can contribute too which is always cool.

The humor is outrageous, often leaning into slapstick, absurd dialogue, and adult jokes. Anna Faris stands out in her debut as Cindy Campbell, delivering a funny and surprisingly charming performance amid the chaos. The Wayans brothers bring their trademark energy and comic timing, making the film both ridiculous and entertaining from start to finish.
Holds up surprisingly well, still funny.

Scary Movie 1 relies on its sharp, over-the-top humor and questionable jokes, featuring mindless yet oddly charming characters while tipping its hat to iconic references like Scream and The Blair Witch Project. The ridiculously intentional bad effects actually make the movie better. If you’re a fan of Scream and enjoy laughing at immorality and (reproductive organs) jokes, this one’s definitely for you.
This was literally Scream scene for scene but much more of a comedy, this is easily the best Scary Movie in the franchise.
PEAK. People looking for a story are weird
